mapper.insert: INSERT INTO status ( statusDate, new_users, new_companies, new_recruitmentNoticeCnt, new_registration, new_reviewBoard ) VALUES ( #{statusDate}, #{newUsers}, #{newCompanies}, #{newRecruitmentNoticeCnt}, #{newRegistration}, #{newReviewBoard} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM status WHERE DATE(statusDate) = #{yesterday} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO total_status ( statusDate, total_users, total_companies, total_recruitmentNoticeCnt, total_registration, total_reviewBoard ) VALUES ( #{statusDate}, #{totalUsers}, #{totalCompanies}, #{totalRecruitmentNoticeCnt}, #{totalRegistration}, #{totalReviewBoard} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM status WHERE statusDate BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(statusDate, '%Y-%m') AS `ym` FROM status ORDER BY `ym` DESC
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR(statusDate) AS year FROM status ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT DISTINCT MONTH(statusDate) AS month FROM status WHERE YEAR(statusDate) = #{year} ORDER BY month ASC
SELECT DISTINCT DAY(statusDate) AS day FROM status WHERE YEAR(statusDate) = #{year} AND MONTH(statusDate) = #{month} ORDER BY day ASC
